```{r test uint3, eval=FALSE}
library(clrng)
library(gpuR)

###CPU streams
t(createStreamsCpu(n=4, initial=12345))



###GPU streams
myStreamsGpu1 = vclMatrix(createStreamsCpu(n=4, initial=12345))

myStreamsGpu2 = createStreamsGpu(n=4, initial=c(12345,12345))
t(as.matrix(myStreamsGpu2))

myStreamsGpu3 = createStreamsGpu(n=4)
t(as.matrix(myStreamsGpu3))
```
